summary: Austria is a country in Central Europe, located in the Alps. It's a federation of nine states, with Vienna as its capital and largest city. Austria has a long history, dating back to the Paleolithic era. It was once part of the Roman Empire and later became a powerful duchy and archduchy. In the 19th century, it formed its own empire, but after World War I, it became a republic. Austria was annexed by Nazi Germany but regained its independence after World War II. Today, it's a democratic country with a strong economy and a member of the European Union.
title: Austria
